intro: Pternopetalum gracillimum, commonly known as the slender-flowered pternopetalum, is a species of flowering plant in the family Malvaceae. It is native to Southeast Asia, particularly found in countries like Thailand and Malaysia. The plant is characterized by its delicate, showy flowers that are typically pink or white in color. It thrives in moist, shaded environments, often growing in forest understories. Its botanical features make it a subject of interest for botanists and horticulturists alike.
